Custom Table Cover Features

Key Features:

  • Full-Color Dye Sublimation Printing
  • Durable, Wrinkle-Resistant Fabric
  • Machine Washable & Flame Retardant
  • Creates a Professional Appearance

Available Styles:

  • Standard Throw: Drapes loosely over the table.
  • Fitted: Sewn corners for a clean, boxy look.
  • Stretch: Form-fitting spandex for a modern look.
  • Table Runner: A narrow cloth to accent a plain cover.

Why Use a Custom Table Cloth?

A custom table cloth is an essential component of any professional trade show booth or event display. It ties your branding together and hides unsightly tables, creating a clean and polished look.

Our high-quality printing process ensures your logo and graphics are vibrant and sharp. The durable polyester fabric is designed to be used again and again, making it a smart investment for your event marketing toolkit.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the difference between a 3-sided and 4-sided throw?

A 4-sided throw covers the table on all four sides, which is great for a centrally located table. A 3-sided throw has an open back, allowing for easy access to storage underneath the table and comfortable seating.

How do I care for my table cloth?

Our table covers are machine washable on a gentle cycle with cold water. Tumble dry on low or air dry to prevent shrinking. They can be steamed or ironed on a low setting to remove any wrinkles.

Will the printed colors be accurate?

We print in CMYK and strive for the closest possible color match. For specific brand colors, we recommend providing Pantone (PMS) color codes, and we can produce a printed proof for your approval for an additional fee.

Technical Specifications

Material & Size Specs:

  • • Material: 8.8 oz. Polyester Fabric
  • • Printing: Full-Color Dye Sublimation
  • • Sizes: For 6ft or 8ft tables
  • • Edges: Sewn Hems

File Requirements:

  • • Use our downloadable templates
  • • Vector files (AI, EPS, PDF) preferred
  • • Resolution: 150 DPI at full size
  • • All text converted to outlines
